157.issue: [E157] admin 6.13.16 listed as dependency but 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.4.10 is recommended. Please update globalDependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.wifilight/blob/master/io-package.json).
